name: Tanguy Ndombele
mini_bio: Club-record signing. Never adapted to the Prem. Loaned out repeatedly.

name: Roberto Soldado
mini_bio: Arrived with hype, left with memes. Penalty merchant.

name: Serge Aurier
mini_bio: Flashed quality between chaos. Card magnet.

name: Paulinho
mini_bio: Brazilian midfielder who disappeared after early promise.

name: Vincent Janssen
mini_bio: Dutch striker with one open-play goal. Flop with a capital F.

name: David Bentley
mini_bio: “The next Beckham” scored once vs Arsenal, then vanished.

name: Georges-Kévin N’Koudou
mini_bio: Brought pace, left no trace. One assist in three years.

name: Helder Postiga
mini_bio: Portugal wonderkid who couldn’t score in the Prem. Gone in a year.

name: Gilberto
mini_bio: Played 3 matches. Subbed in 2. Shortest flop run ever.

name: Emerson Royal
mini_bio: Brazilian fullback with no end product. Constantly exposed.

name: Grzegorz Rasiak
mini_bio: Big man, no goals. Never looked Premier League level.

name: Clinton N’Jie
mini_bio: Injured early, ineffective later. Blink and you missed him.

name: Bongani Khumalo
mini_bio: Signed, loaned, forgotten. Never made a senior appearance.

name: Ricardo Rocha
mini_bio: Looked lost every time he stepped on the pitch.

name: Kevin-Prince Boateng
mini_bio: Immature at Spurs, matured elsewhere. Timing was all wrong.

name: Giovani dos Santos
mini_bio: Talented, but off-field distractions hurt his progress.

name: Ryan Sessegnon
mini_bio: Chronic injury issues. Rarely seen fit or confident.

name: Carlos Vinícius
mini_bio: Loaned from Benfica. Stats padded in Europa League.

name: Bryan Gil
mini_bio: Lightweight and inconsistent. Still hasn’t shown value.

name: Federico Fazio
mini_bio: Turned slower than milk. Sold ASAP.

name: Serhii Rebrov
mini_bio: Ukrainian hitman at Kyiv, couldn’t hit a barn door at Spurs.

name: Bobby Zamora
mini_bio: Brighton legend. Spurs nobody.

name: Mido
mini_bio: Strong start turned sloppy. Failed to justify permanent move.

name: Andy Booth
mini_bio: Emergency striker. Played like one.

name: Ramon Vega
mini_bio: Commanded defence like a nervous sheepdog.

name: Jason Dozzell
mini_bio: Midfield meh. Never clicked at the Lane.

name: Paulo Tramezzani
mini_bio: Just… no. Lasted months.

name: John Scales
mini_bio: Injury-prone, ineffective. Not the worst… just not good.
